Menace
[i]Dark Obsession[/i] – As long as you control a creature named Robin, whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, Tharja, Grim Stalker deals 2 damage to a creature you don't control.
[i]Anathema[/i] – When Tharja, Grim stalker becomes tapped, target creature can't block this turn.
